articles.description: She was pictured beaming in the stands as she watched her husband Jamie take to the pitch just days after her High Court legal battle with fellow WAG Coleen Rooney concluded on Thursday
articles.content: Rebekah Vardy has been snapped enjoying a welcome reprieve from the Wagatha Christie trial that has gripped the nation as she attended Leicester City's final Premier League match of the season at the… [+18431 chars]
